job.title: Data Analyst, ICQA
job.description: <strong><u>Description<br><br></u></strong>ESSENTIAL JOB DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES*<br><br><ul><li>Effectively identify and communicate analytical findings and trends to drive business changes that improve the customer experience and journey.</li><li>Data validation, mining, and discovery.</li><li>Perform ad-hoc analysis and provide business leaders actionable insights as needed.</li><li>Write SQL queries.</li><li>Creation of reports and dashboards utilizing Excel and Power Bi.</li><li>Collaborate with the BI team to support reporting efforts for the ICQA team.</li><li>Identify and define KPIs.<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>BASIC AND PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS (EDUCATION And/or EXPERIENCE)<br><br></u></strong><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, Information Systems, Math, Statistics, or quantitative discipline with 2+ years of professional experience in Analytics/Business Intelligence.</li><li>Experience in inventory control or fulfillment centers a plus.</li><li>Experience working with complex data in large corporate environment a plus.</li><li>A self-starter mentality and ability to operate within a fast-paced and ambiguous environment.</li><li>Data visualization tools such as Power BI, Tableau, and SQL.</li><li>Proficiency in SQL query building and report writing.</li><li>Strong SQL knowledge including but not limited to; complex queries, CTEs, temp tables, stored procedures, cursors.</li><li>Advanced in MS Excel including VLOOKUPs, pivot tables, charts, Power Query, index matches</li></ul>
